mapper.select: select name from shop where code=#{bankCode}

select goods.goodsid, goods.code, goods.name, goods.unit, goods.specs, sum(detail.inqty - detail.outqty) as onhand from goods left join detailbillflow detail on goods.goodsid = detail.goodsid where goods.name like #{name} group by goods.goodsid, goods.code, goods.name, goods.unit, goods.specs
